data.name: Court of Justice's Booming Commerce
data.description: Based on the Quartier Lyonnais in the Court of Fontaine, this place is filled with tons of Fontainian specialty stores and tables at which to also rest and enjoy some tea.\nSome experienced tourists will tell you that you can ask the residents here if you are unfamiliar with the stores and characteristics of the goods on sale. Since many stores strictly follow the price controls set by the Palais Mermonia, very few people will purchase items with incongruent prices.

text.text: This reminds me of the kind of places Lyney takes me to do street magic.
With a parasol for comfort — and without Lyney's constant chatter — I estimate my energy recharge rate will double.
I'm gonna sit here and drink some tea for a while. Wanna join me? I remember how much sugar you take in yours.
Wow, you really thought of everything! I just love this style of table and chairs! The color, the design... so many memories.
It takes me right back to when Lynette and I were little, and we used to do magic tricks on the street. Just like this: Check your pockets.
Haha, yep, you guessed it — I made my move while you were focused on the table and chairs.
